text: Her sex tape with then - boyfriend Rick Salomon got leak in 2003. And 15 years later, Paris Hilton spoke out the damage the video did to her after it hit the internet in the newly released The American Meme documentary on Netflix. The reality star, 37, broke down in tears as she recalled how she felt after it was released :'It was like being raped. It felt like I've lost part of my soul and been talked about in such cruel and mean ways,'via The Decider.
